verses.roman:
dṛṣṭvā viklinna-hṛdayaḥ
kṛṣṇaṁ snehena pāṇḍavaḥ
cirād dṛṣṭaṁ priyatamaṁ
sasvaje 'tha punaḥ punaḥ

synonyms: dṛṣṭvā—seeing; viklinna—melted; hṛdayaḥ—his heart; kṛṣṇam—Lord Kṛṣṇa; snehena—with affection; pāṇḍavaḥ—the son of Pāṇḍu; cirāt—after a long time; dṛṣṭam—seen; priya-tamam—his dearmost friend; sasvaje—he embraced Him; atha—thereupon; punaḥ punaḥ—again and again.
translation: The heart of King Yudhiṣṭhira melted with affection when he saw his dearmost friend, Lord Kṛṣṇa, after such a long separation, and he embraced the Lord again and again.
